div.p: This code system contains example NDC 11 drug product identifiers, used to identify requested and alternative medications in the real-time pharmacy benefit check process. This code system normalizes NDC codes by removing dashes and standardizing the length of each NDC segment. This is a placeholder to be replaced prior to publishing with an HL7/FHIR maintained URL (currently being established).
This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/ndc-11 defines the following codes:

tr.td: Example NDC-11 for esomeprazole magnesium 20mg capsule
